benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/customFields - Add custom fields to account

covered: POST Valid Payload: multiple scenarios cover successful creation with valid payloads and header variations (TC01-03, TC04-TC05).
Account state variations: tests cover accounts with no existing custom fields and with existing custom fields (TC04-TC05).

Input Validation & Error Handling: broad coverage of invalid IDs, missing headers, malformed JSON, empty body, non-existent accounts, unsupported fields, duplicates, empty input, partial inputs, invalid data types, and payload size issues (TC06-TC12, TC08-TC09, TC10, TC11, TC12, TC26-TC28, TC15).
Security Testing: tests for SQL injection and XSS payloads (TC18, TC19).
Boundary & Edge Cases: max payload (TC14), payload exceeding size (TC15), max/min values (TC29), null values (TC30).
Resilience & Recovery: service unavailable (TC17) and transient network recovery (TC20).
Authorization & Access Control: missing CreatedBy header (TC07) and unauthorized access (TC16).
Performance & Reliability: performance tests under normal and peak load (TC21, TC22).
Regression & Integration: regression tests (TC23-24) and integration with dependent service (TC25).
Query Parameter Handling: extra query parameters (TC13).
Data Integrity: response body checks and association of created fields to account (TC01).
gaps: 500 Internal Server Error scenario not present (only 503).
Dedicated idempotency tests for duplicate submissions not present.
recommendations: Add an explicit 500 Internal Server Error test (simulate database/service failure) to validate server error handling.
Add 403 Forbidden tests to cover insufficient privileges.
Add rate limiting and caching header tests to evaluate performance and caching behavior.
Add idempotency tests for duplicate POST submissions and ensure deterministic results.
Add more targeted concurrency tests to expose race conditions with simultaneous posts.
